A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An appalling movie\, that betrays the fundamentals of the Star Wars franchise. The Shakespearean\, poetic story narratives are gone\, the powerful\, otherworldly dialogue is replaced with Marvel-like humour\, that is so bad that is completely destroys scenes. All the promising plot points set up in A New Hope 2.0 (The Force Awakens) have been decimated\, and for what reason\, well I guess only Rian Johnson knows... The whole film seems as if it exists\, purely and solely to satisfy politically correct ideologies.
